external_games.name: Luna Story III: On Your Mark
external_games.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Luna Story III: On Your Mark

name: Luna Story III: On Your Mark
storyline: Moonkeeper endured for a long, long time, and finally faced the princess he couldn’t forget even in his dreams. But, the time was too long. It made countless flowers bloom and lose. It made Moonkeeper empty. Moonkeeper left the place leaving nothing but his longing heart beside her asleep. And... she woke up. Now she's trying to find him. “I'm going on a long journey.”
summary: Solve the puzzle and join the princess in her journey. We have a special illustration that you can't see anywhere. Experience a huge epic connected from the first episode, with a fairy-like precious and beautiful story.
